content.data: This output will create program files for ProEdge Tools Drill / Dowel machines. Assign tools to this machine and to the operations to create output. It is specific to Lockdowel setup with support for Spring Pins(LD), HClip (barbed)(LE), Channel Lock(LCK), HClip w/Spring Pin(LHK),Delta Clip(LDCK), L-Slot(LLS), Surface Slot(RECT) and Edge Slot(L1). Each program will represent one side of a part. Enter the parameter name based on the operations in the Parameter fieldin this Link's Output section. Example: For Spring Pins enter 'LD'
